title: Breaking Bad Finale: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Julia Turner, John Swansburg, June Thomas and Willa Paskin discuss the series finale of Breaking Bad. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen this episode.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
